ComicInfo.Summary: After an intense battle with the Fiendus henchmen, the Agents of Pantheon are lured into a battle with a mammoth creature from the Underworld: The KRAKEN! Unbeknownst to the Agents, this confrontation is a scheme designed by Fiendus to detour them while he seeks out a sacred portal that will release Hades and the Underworld on earth. Will the Agents of Pantheon defeat the Kraken before Fiendus discovers the portal's location? Or have the Agents doomed the Earth to an Underworld invasion?
ComicInfo.Title: Terror From The Deep
